landing.title: PetPal - Find Reliable Pet Sitter
landing.sub-title: Welcome to PetPal, your go-to platform for finding reliable and trustworthy pet sitters. Whether you're going on vacation, have a busy work schedule, or simply need someone to take care of your furry friend, PetPal is here to help.
landing.description: PetPal is a web application designed to connect pet owners with experienced pet sitters in their local area. Our platform provides a convenient and secure way to search for, book, and communicate with pet sitters who are passionate about caring for animals.
